text: The Party for Rejuvenation Research (), from 2022 to 2024 the Party for Biomedical Rejuvenation Research (), is a small political party in Germany. It was founded in Berlin in 2015 as Party for Health Research (). == Positions == The party wants to speed up the development of rejuvenation medicine, which will help people stay healthy and alive for a very long time. The party wants to stop people from getting sick and old. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2015 establishments in Europe Category:2010s establishments in Germany Category:Political parties in Germany
title: Party for Rejuvenation Research
